# Course Overview

This course is the third and last in the EDUC quantitative method sequence, which is intended to provide a toolkit of statistical concepts, methods, and their implementations to producers of applied research in education and other social sciences.

**Pre-requisite: EDUC 641 and EDUC 643. Also a familiarity with at least one statistical programming language - preferably R language - is required.**
